â€œTonight's adventure with a concentrate of Hardcore OG has me completely and amazingly impaired.

I saw the flower on sale for insulting prices here in SF, so I got curious about what made it so special. I love Indica too, so I decided to scratch the itch.

After doing some research,  I found a cult that worshiped tonight's concentrate which is supposed to be able to cripple a  rhino: rhino down. I feel like a happy l...â€

â€œAnother fire og the name speaks for it's self just picked up 10 gs and I'm loving it true 
og strain tastes great smells great and the high is outstandingâ€

â€œThis shit dope 











But for real, hardcore is a very sedating ,yet relaxed high with the quality of being baked for some time . Almost as if when you smoke this , you are the edible getting baked ;)â€

â€œHardcore Og from West Coast Cure is some of the terpiest, tastiest, most sedating form of THC I've come across. These guys's work is INCREDIBLE and absolutely worth it. 5/5 Strain, and 5/5 concentrate EVERY batch.â€

â€œNot as hardcore (pun intended) as I thought/was told it was gonna be. It takes a few minutes to set in, and then relaxation and euphoria takes ahold. Recommended for night use due to sleepiness after about an hour.â€

â€œThe description of this strain NAILS it. Ive been searching far and wide for something to break through the redundancy. Even have been considering a tolerance break since nothing was getting me to the headspace I was seeking. Hardcore lived up to its name and made me and 4 friends so damn giggly and full of freakin glee lol. Such a fun ride.â€

â€œWest Coast Cure Bhomb - Cakebatter concentrate 


Super smooth, intense high, very unique and well worth the premium pricing.


Jarret is the very talented master chef at WCC the purveyors of this award winning strain and he is gift to the industry.â€
â€œEveryday smoker, and this still puts me on my ass at the end of the day. Great for snapping small bowls and relaxing, just a few and you're good.â€
â€œSmoking this indica as a vape. I love it! The taste is one to be knownâ€

â€œThe name speaks for itself. It's the strongest strain I've had. The high is beyond relaxing. I was literally in another dimension! This is in my top 3 for sure! Oh yeah and if you have any body pain, tell it bye bye!!â€

â€œI'm all about the flavor and scent profiles in strains. This one is pretty cool because it has a nice flavor profile, with some earthy grape notes in there. As far as anxiety and pain goes, I'm super spaced out and I feel like Gumby. Keep this for the I just want to have fun and feel good" times. Highly recommended.â€"
â€œsweet strain, very strong and calming. relaxing. giggly, very stoned.struggling to write a review lol. it's good stuff. [10/10]â€
â€œreally loved the high that this strain has and too me it was a lingering high and very relaxing...â€
â€œvery nice aroma and taste...the high is very relaxing and mind numbing....love it..â€
â€œGood strain. Nice relaxing indica to end the night.â€
â€œHardcore OG has a sweet taste and  gives an amazing body buzz and relaxed feeling.â€
â€œGreat night sleep medicine. Concentrate from Cal. Comes in with a relaxing transition to bed. Not recommended for daytime use. Overall tasty & relaxing.â€

â€œI donâ€™t know how to explain how much I love this strain. No anxiety, complete body relaxation, and helps me fall asleep. I didnâ€™t have to smoke very much to feel the effects. I smoke everyday and this shit got me on another level quick and the high lasts for longer than others. I love you hardcore og.â€

â€œThis was a beautiful, dense, earthy and smelled a little like blueberries!  This was one of the most powerful strains I've ever tried in beautiful Mendocino, California, perfect for evenings after a hard day at work and for a restful nights sleep.  Wish I had picked up more!â€

â€œthis is one tasty strain. first hit went instantly through my body and I relaxed my entirety with such an enjoyable and happy high. best thing was my head was still on point and I had the best sleep I've had in a while. this is a great strain.â€
â€œGets me super drunk stoned. Like get ready to veg out bc your gonna get stuck to the sofa.â€

â€œGot this as a Pure Vape cart. Just awesome. Missing it a lot on the East coast. I could function on it, although difficult as I wanted to sleep. It was a lot of fun to get high with another person and just laugh about everything. Music therapy was great with it. And a couple extra hits or mixing with Grandaddy Purple sent me instantly to sleep.â€
â€œit gave me a strong mind and body high. mind was too clouded for me to be able to think straight. body was relaxed and heavy.â€
â€œHardcore OG has a sweet taste and  gives an amazing body buzz and relaxed feeling.â€
â€œMy favorite strainâ€
â€œvery good product great for painâ€

I smoke everyday and this shit got me on another level quick and the high lasts for longer than others. I love you hardcore og.â€
â€œthis s*** is the bombâ€
â€œVery relaxing. The body high is really good.â€
â€œTried this as a concentate and had couch lock in about 20 minutes. Great for maxin and relaxin.â€

â€œStiiizy concentrate. This strain is sleeping medicine. I only use it in the evenings because it's so sedating that it would make daily activities very difficult. This strain produces a strong body high that's defined by sinking sensations of blissful numbness throughout every inch of the body, as well as a noticeable euphoria that creeps up. There is almost no head high, but music sounds incredible. Great strain for ...â€
â€œA new favorite Kush for sure. Packs a punch and will definitely leave you couch locked. Don't expect to be too productive but a great relaxing and unwinding smoke.â€

This strain produces a strong body high that's defined by sinking sensations of blissful numbness throughout every inch of the body, as well as a noticeable euphoria that creeps up. There is almost no head high, but music sounds incredible. Great strain for ...â€
â€œTasted and smelled good. But it left me super duper tired. I would be energetic for an hour or so and fall asleep right awayâ€
â€œGot a Nug Run shatter gotta say it lives up to the hype id put it up there with King Louix And Diamond OG as far as getting the classic indica effects to the fullest.â€
â€œTried this as a concentate and had couch lock in about 20 minutes. Great for maxin and relaxin.â€

â€œTook one hit of the vape and my legs felt like collapsing under me. I could feel the effects all over my body, and all pain and stress melted away. My friend bought a full-gram cartridge and I have never felt more envy in my life than I do right now.

Thankfully, I'm getting a half gram for myself tomorrow because this shit is fire ğŸ”¥ ğŸ”¥ ğŸ”¥â€
â€œA new favorite Kush for sure. Packs a punch and will definitely leave you couch locked. Don't expect to be too productive but a great relaxing and unwinding smoke.â€
â€œhad this strain in the bhomb from WWC SUPER TASTY CRISP CLEAN. THE HIGH IS FUNCTIONAL FOCUS A GREAT STRAINN BUT STILL NOT IN THE TOP 5. GONNA TRY.FLOWER TOMORROW..â€

â€œSince this one got really great reviews, I decided to give this one a try. A definite heavy hitter, great for pain control and sleepy times.  My new favorite and a re-purchase. I fully loved this strain.â€

â€œHardcore OG is consistently a favorite of mine. Cannacruz always has it around as a preroll (although I have yet to see the flower on its own anywhere) and it's one of my main go-tos. Blueberry is tied for my favorite strain and its sweet flavor and full body relaxation match well with Big Bud's heaviness to make a knockout strain with musky berry flavors and powerful sedation.â€
â€œReally strong and great tasting indica concentrate. This strain is exactly what I look for in a really heavy indica. Kinda reminds me of white rhino.â€
â€œThis strain is absolute terps ! Russian assassin boyz killed it with the genetics but jungle boyz did what they do best and took the full potential out of herâ€
â€œFat, sticky buds. Great indica.â€

â€œThe name says it all.... 
and Hardcore will never die  but your pain will melt away & you wonâ€™t gaf about your troubles either!â€
â€œI just love itğŸ¤¤ Taste good. It's a great night strain. Heavy body relaxation.  #STIIIZY#Vapeâ€

â€œThis strain is always on my roster because of its consistency. I get a nice happy, with a nice relaxed high. It really helps with depression, and allows my mind to clear up a bit and allow myself to get in a better state of mind. I have a fairly high tolerance, so for me to feel the high on this strain is a plus.â€
â€œThis is my new favorite strain. It is sooooo euphoric and puts you right to sleep.â€
â€œThis is currently one of my favorite nighttime strains. Awesome taste, increase in feelings of wellbeing, chills the mind, and then itâ€™s bon voyage on the SS Snooze.â€
â€œOne of those strains that is an actual couchlock. Very intense and sedating but also a very nice and mellow/relaxing high.â€

â€œOG lovers rejoice because this is HARDCORE! Strain had 24% THC & it made me happy, relaxed & then sleepy. If you use this during the day you will feel the come down & it is HEAVY! Night/bed time strain for sure. Pine/lemon/citrus smell & taste. Pistils were burnt orange & the trichomes were of crystal. Medium green on the outside & light lime green on the inside. Buds were fresh & a little on the sticky side :) 420â€
â€œVery nice, the taste was good the buzz was creeper it took a few minutes to hit then wow it was a pain releiver and a last high. good stuff .â€

â€œMan this strain is a god send my back and neck have been extremely stiff inflamed n just ready eye pain jumping off went to dr so they Cud rec me to a chiropractor n gave me pills I dnt like pills they sitting there I hit up my spot n man inflammation is really den stress n pain man I can turn my neck again without a grabbing pinching pain this strain is da shit! For more search YouTube: 
1130globsquadâ€

â€œUnder the negative effects tab it only gives a very small indication for headaches. However, I recently picked up 7g and I have to be honest, I noticed the headache significantly more. Besides that the high from it is pretty good and it does the job. Definitely not one of my favorites but then again I usually like Sativa better so I can't judge to harshly. I'll give it a 4 out of 5. 

P.S. This is my first review ......â€

â€œMy favorite type of flower!!!!
Someone recommend me hardcore og from a dispensary, from one hit I was high as a kite! 
I felt so high to the point where I felt like I was in heaven. That's how high I got. 
Cookies and cream used to be my favorite but ever since someone recommended this type of flower it felt like it was my first time I smoked.â€

â€œSmell is great! Buds not to dense and not to leafy. Covered in trichomes. Tastes like an OG with a full bodied smoke. Could be a bit much for some due to the thick smoke this bud creates, hence the four stars. I enjoyed it thoroughly and would recommend it to the novice patient looking for a good full body high.â€
â€œIt honestly makes my body feel much more relaxed, especially when Iâ€™m too tense from working out.â€

Super potent indica that made me just want to lay down and smile.â€

â€œRelaxing and mood-lifting, great for my nausea and joint pain WITHOUT causing paranoia & heart racing. This is a miracle for me since Iâ€™ve experienced a lot of negative side effects which made me quit all but completely. My faith has been restored with this amazing concentrate!â€
â€œoverall great high, I just didn't like the after taste it left in my mouth.â€
â€œSmells very Citrusy and the Pine is very strong with this strain. Very very good tasting and a fantastic relaxing high. This strain will become a regular.â€
